Bite Evolution: Bite attack inflicts 1d8+10 HP

Companion Darkvision: 60' b/w vision in darkness
Companion Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Devotion: +4 Will vs. enchantment
Eye For Talent: Animal companion, bonded mount, cohort, or familiar gains +2 on choice of ability
Link (Summoner): May communicate w/eidolon over any distance/Shares magic item slots w/eidolon
Multiattack: Reduce additional attack penalty to -2 or second attack at -5
Reach Evolution: Choice of 1 attacks each gains +5' reach
Share Spells (Summoner): May cast spells that effect self on eidolon instead
Slam Evolution: Slam attacks inflict 2d6+10 HP each
Spell Resistance Evolution: Has Spell Resistance 21
Tail Evolution: +4 Acrobatics (balance)
Tail Slap Evolution: Slap attacks inflict 1d8+7 HP each
